amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-259 to reduce the appropriation to the Congressional Budget Office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 314 (Roll no. 416).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 314 (Roll no. 416).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Perry.
